author: Jade Goodwin
comment: This app is almost always completely accurate. I like that I can set my favorites so that I don't have to go looking for the nearest stop all the time. Only complaint is some times the notifications don't show up in app for me, I don't know why though. And I can still read them on my phone notification so it's not a huge deal. Honestly, great app if you have to use the ttx.

author: Alannah Murphy
comment: It hasn't been that reliable lately and there's some problematic bugs that have prevented me from using the app properly. For instance just now I tried to search Westbound 503 arrival times and it is only giving me Eastbound.

author: Deebs 1love
comment: I use transit daily and depend mostly on this app. I've tried others but I find this one to be most accurate.
Next bus ETA is not always accurate, but the app has a direct link to the TTC website/schedules so it's relatively easy to figure out

author: totally restrained
comment: Very useful... i always check before i walk out my house... when the next bus will arrive.

author: Shimeika Holness
comment: Great App. Just wondering why there is no updated version of the Subway Map ..

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hey Shimeika, we will update it in the next release. Thanks for your feedback. I hope you can reconsider your review :) anything less than 5 stars hurts future development.

author: Stephanie Fleming
comment: Almost always accurate. I have a feeling when it's not, it's due to a sudden change in the TTC's itinerary.

author: অরূপ রায়
comment: Gives you Bus Arrival time and Location correctly at least 90% of the time
Thank you 👍 I used in Toronto TTC Very good

author: Andy Schoenhofer
comment: Works as required.

author: Lisa Telio
comment: The accuracy is great!

author: John Collis
comment: Great app!

author: R Kelly
comment: Phenomenal.

author: Carl Hood
comment: Sheppard West 84a West bond. Now Sheppard West has an 84 e

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Thanks! It should be fixed. Email me if not

author: Tony Jose
comment: It would be great if an onscreen compass is also available

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Great idea! Thanks for your feedback. Is there anything else I can do to earn a better rating?

author: Dayna Mailach
comment: Love this app. Does everything it needs to and no more.

author: Mike Abrams
comment: A minute off of what it says to be which is not bad

author: Aelita Yoon
comment: By far, the most accurate and best app for TTC real-time updates, and I've gone through a couple of them. Includes notifications for officially announced delays in the subway as well. Can recommend stops based on your GPS location. Includes a database of stop numbers for when you're offline, just by tapping the line number you want to check when you don't have internet. There's also a handy "track a friend" feature for late night commutes. Definitely recommend!

Very inaccurate. Based on the schedule of the transit and not on real time. I get to my stop when it tells me I have 3min left and when I arrive it's gone. The old app was way better at predicting how much time I have left.

I've tried the others but this is the easiest to use and very accurate too. I don't know how I can function with public transportation now without this app esp. in winter. I don't have to wait out there in the cold esp. in my stop where there is no shelter. You are doing TTC a great service, they should acknowledge that and of course the TTC riders too.

author: Girish V
comment: I installed on Iphone. Everytime it does not detects the location. So only option is to search for bus stop name. In the other andriod phone the bus stops are in seq but in iphone the bus route stops are all shuffled and not in order. Please fix the issue.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hey, I am sorry the iOS version is unlike Android. We're working hard to improve it. I hope you can reconsider your 2 star review as lower ratings drive app development down. We appreciate your constructive feedback and definitely open to an email discussion! Thanks :)

comment: This is my go-to app every time I go out. It is mostly accurate and only failed me once. Overall, this is a great app.

author: Zu Zu
comment: It would be perfect if it had some of the features of Citymapper or Transit......like a " get off soon " alarm or a " navigate to " feature...... they can do it.....so can you

author: Chris
comment: Needs gear support. Pebble is dead

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Thanks so much Chris! So many features, so little time to make them all happen. Share for support! :D

author: Victor Ferreira
comment: IT WORKS, AND I LOVE IT.

author: Tanya Ves
comment: Great app!

author: Kenneth Baker
comment: Love it. Extremely helpful.

author: Ed Jonsen
comment: Love the information

author: Yenly Gozal
comment: The app is great. But I hope that you would change the "Service Alert" notification. It only appears once and I can't even see the whole alert in ny notification bar. Once I tap on the alert, it disappeared and I only get the first half of the alert. It would be better if the full alert opened up in the app itself after I tap it in the notification bar. Thank you.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hey there! The predictions originate from a 3rd party provider called Nextbus. It's out of my control but what else can I improve to earn a better rating?

author: Noel Hopkins
comment: Some times a bus is expected but it does not show up, misleading
On point!

author: Gil Elevazo
comment: Very reliable

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Thank you so much Gil. If there's ever any feedback, email me. Hope you can spread the word to your mates!

author: Knight Hulk
comment: Totally inaccurate. It doesn't show bluenight service. I've been an all time user of the old version of the app. Compared to the old app this current app have less features. Plus I have paid for the old app. Why would I pay again for this one? Uninstalled.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hi Knight, can you tell me what blue bus you're looking for. The app uses the same data so it must show it. Email me. As for paying again to remove ads, I've made sure existing paid members get a substantial discount but email me so I can make it right for you!!

author: 葛钰琪
comment: Sometime widget won't refresh.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content:
Hi,

Can you please try delete and re-adding the widget (or resizing it)?

If you've changed themes recently, it may require a reset. I apologize for the inconvenience. I am working on a better solution.

Let me know if that works via email.

Any chance you can re-consider your review? Anything less than 5 stars if a failure on our part..

author: Eve Lyn
comment: It gets the job done.. accurate within 2 mins.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Thanks Eve Lyn! Anything we can do to improve your rating?

author: Kiran Ayyanki
comment: Its good for basic transit timings

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Thank you Kiran! That means a lot. Please spread the word to your friends so we keep on improving this app :)

comment: Helpful

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Thanks! That means a lot. Please share with your friends and family so we can continue developing updates.

author: TimBee100
comment: The times are not always accurate. Not sure where the responsibility lies - with the app or the TTC.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hey Tim! The data come from Nextbus.com. Any chance you might reconsider your review? Email me and I'll verify accuracy or report on your behalf.

author: Andrew Knox
comment: Wrong only very infrequently and it's probably the TTC's fault, not the app.

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hey Andrew, yes, it could be attributed to Nextbus data. Email me the specific stop and I'll verify. Anything I can do to earn a better rating? Anything less than 5 stars is a failure.

author: Camille p
comment: Not always accurate but mostly

reply.author: Transit Now - Bus & Bike
reply.content: Hey Camille! The data comes from Nextbus which all apps use. Is there anything I can do to earn a better rating? Anything less than 5 stars is a failure on my part.
